title: In-Unit-Laundry, Spacious, Great Location!
posting_body: """Spacious, sun filled apartment with: In-Unit-Laundry (to be installed), lots of storage and a back yard!

Great Avondale location (Roscoe and Ridgeway) which offers easy access to the blue line, the highway and some good restaurants (La Villa, La Nonna, Manee Thai, Smoque, Jung Boo, Brasa Roja, Stara Polska), cafes (Backlot Coffee, Brew Brew, Turtle Sip) and pubs (Sleeping Village, Avondale Tap, Late Bar).
2) Clean, quiet, well behaved cats and dogs (20 lbs. or less) considered on a case-by-case basis.
3) No smoking inside of the apartment.
Call or text (847-347-3293) today; great places don't last long!
Raider Realty works all over the city, but our core areas are: Logan Square, Avondale and Old Irving Park. "
